item.title: Video Editor Needed - Upwork
item.description:
A video editor is needed for a conspiracy channel

Here are some examples of the EXACT video editing styles we are looking for you to edit:

https://youtu.be/PilJj0TR_xk?si=H2N7MRISRBC_P9y9

If you’re confident you can edit in this EXACT SAME STYLE without changing anything, then apply for this ASAP.

If you do not think you can edit in this EXACT style, do NOT apply.
Here are our other requirements. Everything mentioned is here for a reason and is required. Do NOT apply if you don’t meet all these requirements:

Things required:
- Fluent in English
- EXTREME ATTENTION TO DETAILS
- Quick at responding
- Be receptive to constructive feedback
- Be able to learn new things quickly
- Be able to use The Google Suite: Gmail, Drive, Docs, Sheets, Calendar, etc You’ll be researching the video, outlining a summary, and writing the script. - Quick 24-hour turnaround times - A strong computer that is able to edit videos - Fast wifi, including fast upload speed if available in your area

To apply, send us a link to 2-3 of the best things you've edited (make sure the link is viewable). Do NOT send more than 2-3 examples.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 17:07 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Commercial, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Commercial, Adobe After Effects
Country: Nigeria
click to apply

item.title: Create a Promo Video - Upwork
item.description:
Match Sense by Field
Inspirational Promo Video

Project Overview
Create a captivating and inspirational promotional video under 20 seconds in duration for Match Sense by Field. The video will showcase amateur padel players in action on the court, highlighting the innovative camera technology, and emphasize the convenience of accessing match insights via mobile devices.

item.title: TikTok Shops Live Streamer (Must be Located in the US) - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented individual to livestream on TikTok Shops. As a live streamer, you will be responsible for engaging with viewers to increase sales using the product samples that we will send you. This is a great opportunity to leverage the growing popularity of TikTok and reach a large audience.

You will be provided with an existing TikTok account to login to and to Livestream with. We can work on a 50/50 profit split approach (more profitable) or a fixed hourly rate of up to $20.

Candidate Requirements:

- Proficient in using TikTok LIVE and familiar with its features
- Good communication and presentation skills
- Ability to engage and entertain viewers
- Knowledge of product demonstration techniques
- Must be located in the USA

Hourly Range: $5.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 16:58 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Video Production, Video Editing, Videography, Social Media Marketing, Android
Skills: Video Production, Video Editing, Videography, Social Media Marketing, Android
Country: United States

item.title: Video Editing - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to create a 2-3 minute long video using existing content. The main audience for this video is business professionals, and it will be used in a B2B context. The video should be engaging, high-quality, and maintain a professional yet dynamic tone.

  Responsibilities:
   - Arrange the clips in a logical and engaging sequence
  - Enhance the video with suitable transitions and effects effects
  - Ensure the final product meets our brand guidelines and objectives

  Required skills:
- Basic business understanding of B2B space specifically in areas related to software development services
- Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
- Strong understanding of storytelling and pacing
- Ability to work with existing footage and create a cohesive narrative
- Attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines




Posted On: June 25, 2024 16:50 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: United States

item.title: Youtube Video Editor Needed - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled Youtube Video Editor to join our team. As a Youtube Video Editor, you will be responsible for editing and enhancing video content for our channel. I will provide you with scripts and voiceovers, and then you find footage or build 3D models to help me edit the videos.
Sample Examples:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SUllVJbMQ0Q&t=1343s

Required Skills
- Video editing
- Familiarity with Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro or DaVinci Resolve
- Ability to add text, graphics and animation
- Sound editing and mixing
- Color correction
- Video compression and export

This is a medium-sized project lasting 3 to 6 months.
I hope you have similar experience and can work with me for a long time.

Hourly Range: $12.00-$36.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 16:47 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production

item.title: Virtual Assistant - Video Editor & Content Creation for Real Estate Content - Upwork
item.description:
We need a skilled Video Editor to join our team and create engaging videos for our real estate agents using CapCut. This includes editing videos, adding text and captions, and creating your own content on camera. Fluency in both Spanish and English is required.

Responsibilities:

Edit Videos: Trim and edit raw footage from Google Photos.
Text Boxes: Add and style text boxes for locations, key points, and final comments.
Auto Captions: Generate and correct auto captions, ensuring they look great.
Music & Sounds: Add background music or sound effects as needed.
Create Content: Use provided videos to create your own engaging content on camera in Spanish and English.
Assist Agents: Help agents edit their videos while maintaining their style.

Requirements:
Experience with video editing, preferably using CapCut.
Attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines.
Fluent in Spanish and English.
Comfortable being on camera to create content.

Preferred:
Experience with real estate or social media videos.
Knowledge of social media trends and best practices.

Hourly Range: $7.00-$12.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 16:43 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Advertising, Content Writing, Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Advertising, Content Writing, Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Submagic video editor - Upwork
item.description:
Hey, I am looking for a submagic editor, who is able to edit content for 2 of my clients in 2 different formats, using submagic. The formats are super simple for someone who is at a intermediate skil level. If you have any experience creating videos on submagic, and your able to handle around 20-50 videos minimum every month. Then please send me some videos you have edited via submagic. I will review and get back to you.

Please note: only message me back/ show interest in the job, if your open to creating a quick 20 second video following a specific reference video I want you to follow!

I’ve attached one of the example videos I would like for you to be able to replicate.

Budget: $30

item.title: Videographer and Video Editor Needed - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and creative videographer and video editor to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong passion for videography and editing, as well as a keen eye for detail. This role requires proficiency in videography techniques, video editing software, and the ability to download and organize footage effectively.

  Responsibilities:
  - Put together high-quality videos
  - Edit and enhance videos using Final Cut Pro, Adobe Premiere Pro or similar software
  - Download and organize footage from various sources
  - Collaborate with the team to brainstorm and develop video ideas
  - Ensure all videos align with the brand's style and guidelines
  - Meet deadlines and deliver high-quality videos

  Requirements:
  - Proven experience as a videographer and video editor
  - Proficiency in videography techniques and equipment
  - Strong knowledge of video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro
  - Ability to download and organize footage effectively
  - Excellent attention to detail
  - Strong communication and collaboration skills

  Size: Medium
  Duration: 1 to 3 months
  Expertise: Intermediate


Posted On: June 25, 2024 16:39 UTC
Category: Videography

Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Videography, Video Production

item.title: Seeking Talented and Detail-Oriented Video and Audio Editor and Course Creation - Upwork
item.description:
Responsibilities:

- Edit audio and video recordings for podcast episodes and online courses, ensuring high-quality output.
- Sync audio and video tracks, cut and trim clips, and remove unwanted noise and errors.
- Enhance audio quality by adjusting levels, equalization, and applying noise reduction techniques.
- Add intros, outros, music, and sound effects to enhance the overall production value.
- Collaborate with the content creation team to ensure the final product aligns with our vision and standards.
- Manage and organize media files, ensuring efficient workflow and storage practices.
- Stay updated with the latest editing software, tools, and trends to continually improve the quality of our content.
- Handle multiple work and ensure each project meets its respective deadlines and quality standards.

Requirements:

- Proven experience in video and audio editing, preferably for podcasts and online courses.
- Proficiency with editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, Audacity, or similar tools.
- Strong understanding of audio and video editing techniques and best practices.
- Excellent attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines.
- Strong communication skills and ability to work collaboratively in a remote team environment.
- Creativity and a passion for storytelling through video and audio mediums.

Budget: $5 per hour - Please submit proposals within this range. Proposals exceeding this budget will not be considered.

How to Apply:
If you are passionate about creating engaging content and have the skills and experience required for this role, we would love to hear from you.

We are an equal opportunity employer and welcome applicants from all backgrounds to apply.

Hourly Range: $5.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 16:16 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Audition, Final Cut Pro, Video Editing, Audio Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Audio Production, Video Post-Editing, Audio Post Production, Audacity
Skills: Adobe Audition, Final Cut Pro, Video Editing, Audio Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Audio Production, Video Post-Editing, Audio Post Production, Audacity
Country: United States
click to apply
